text: The Upper Hand is a British television sitcom which was broadcast on ITV from 1990 to 1996. Seven series and 94 episodes were produced. The following is a list of episodes. ==Series overview== ==Series 1 (1990)== ==Series 2 (1991)== ==Series 3 (1991-1992)== {| class="wikitable" style="width: 60%; margin-right: 0; background: #ffffff;" |- ! style="background: #50C878; color: #ffffff;" colspan="3"| Series Three |- ! style="background: #50C878; color: #ffffff;" | Episode ! style="background: #50C878; color: #ffffff;" | Title ! style="background: #50C878; color: #ffffff;" | Original air date |- |} ==Series 4 (1992-1993)== {| class="wikitable" style="width: 60%; margin-right: 0; background: #ffffff;" |- ! style="background: #FFE135; color: #ffffff;" colspan="3"| Series Four |- ! style="background: #FFE135; color: #ffffff;" | Episode ! style="background: #FFE135; color: #ffffff;" | Title ! style="background: #FFE135; color: #ffffff;" | Original air date |- |} ==Series 5 (1993)== {| class="wikitable" style="width: 60%; margin-right: 0; background: #ffffff;" |- ! style="background: #ED872D; color: #ffffff;" colspan="3"| Series Five |- ! style="background: #ED872D; color: #ffffff;" | Episode ! style="background: #ED872D; color: #ffffff;" | Title ! style="background: #ED872D; color: #ffffff;" | Original air date |- |} ==Series 6 (1995)== {| class="wikitable" style="width: 60%; margin-right: 0; background: #ffffff;" |- ! style="background: #E171A3; color: #ffffff;" colspan="3"| Series Six |- ! style="background: #E171A3; color: #ffffff;" | Episode ! style="background: #E171A3; color: #ffffff;" | Title ! style="background: #E171A3; color: #ffffff;" | Original air date |- |} ==Series 7 (1996)== {| class="wikitable" style="width: 60%; margin-right: 0; background: #ffffff;" |- ! style="background: #FAD6A5; color: #ffffff;" colspan="3"| Series Seven |- ! style="background: #FAD6A5; color: #ffffff;" | Episode ! style="background: #FAD6A5; color: #ffffff;" | Title ! style="background: #FAD6A5; color: #ffffff;" | Original air date |- |} ==External links== * Category:Lists of British sitcom episodes
